concept.title: Base64 Field Decoder
concept.shortdesc: The Base64 Field Decoder decodes Base64 encoded data to binary data. Use the processor to decode Base64 encoded data before evaluating data in the field.

conbody.p: processorsBase64 Field DecoderBase64 Field Decoder processoroverviewWhen you configure Base64 Field Decoder, you specify the byte array field to decode and the target byte array field to pass the decoded value to.
